description: {WAhead, and to the west, mountains loom.  There Is a path leading
through the snow to the east.  The snow is about 2 feet deep in
places, so halflings and other small creatures need to beware
ofbecomming burried.  A path in the snow leads north, into the little
village known locally as Bryn Shander.  {x
33464.name: {cA{Cpp{Wroach{Cin{cg {DBryn {cS{Ch{Wand{Ce{cr{x

description: Looking closely you see two femurs, a skull, a few rib bones and a
mandible.  As the recognition creeps into your mind, a shiver escapes
your soul.  Did these bones really belong to someone of your own race?
{WThe plains of Icewind Dale stretch out vastly for miles around.  To
the west you can see a small town, while to the north, the jagged,
shadowy peaks of the Spine of the World reach skyward like skeletal
fingers.  A small pile of bleached bones lays scattered about here.  {x
33401.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThis small path winds off from the plains to the south.  There is a
small grove of lifeless, barren trees up ahead, and an icy gale blows
in from the mountains.  A game trail heads up through the mountains.  {x
33407.name: {cS{Cec{Wluded P{Cat{ch{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33459.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: You stand in a large open cavern, There are large stalagtites
hanging from the roof.  There is an extremely large one in the middle
of the room that seems to be holding up the roof?  There is a deathly
wind coming in from the small entrance up above, and you can hear a
loud breathing in and out.  There are jewels and assorted pieces of
weaponry and armor scattered all over the floor.
33450.name: {wA {DDark{w, {cI{Cc{cy {WC{wa{Wv{we{Wr{wn{x

description: {WThe path curves to avoid a steep hill to the north, and as the road
continues past the snow covered hill, the whole of the village is
visible from your high vantage point.  It is a very small village, a
few huts to house the inhabitants, a couple of places of business, and
a frozen over river running through the centre.  It links up over the
far west to some sort of building.  {x
33435.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WA large and old boathouse is to the east.  It is batterd and run
down, as the river to the east has been frozen over permanently for
years.  The winds blow chillingly cold all around.  {x
33473.name: Gravel Pathway

description: Hidden away in the side of the main cavern is a small alcove.
There is surprisingly little light here, and all that is visible is a
small chest in the middle of the room.  The chest is carved out of the
very ice that covers the floor of the cavern like a frozen carpet.
The only exit is back the way you came in.
33451.name: {WA {CS{cmal{Cl {yCave{x

description: {WThe entrance to a large and expensive looking house is here to the
north.  The doors are usually locked, to prevent anyone untrustworthy
entering.  A large hill to the west forms a natural border to the
village, and the gravel path runs south along the edge of the hill.  {x
33448.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WThe gorge comes to an end, at the base of the mountain.  Looking
up, it isn't possible to see the top, as it is so high, above the
snowy mists and vapour in the air.  A path around the base of the
mountain leads off to the west.  {x
33472.name: {DPath {cT{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {DThe {CI{cc{Cy {cG{Co{Wr{Cg{ce{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33494.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: {WThe cold bitter wind blows with a freezing force as the plains of
Icewind Dale move closer to the sea of moving ice.  The only way
forward seems to be to the north.  There is a small pathway back to
the east towards the spine of the world.  {x
33427.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: Although this is a servant's quarters, it is still of high quality,
like the rest of the house.  The servant gets a nice comfortable bed
on the eastern side of the room under a silver framed window.  There
is a fairly good quality rug on a neatly polished wooden floor.  A
door to the south leads to the servant's bathroom.
33485.name: Servant's Bedroom

description: {WThere is a branch off the gravel path to the north.  It leads to
the Snowdrift Inn.  There you can find lodgings, although not of the
most pleasant nature.  Not many people venture this far north.  It is
usually only the brave adventurers who seek glory at any price.  The
main gravel pathway continues into the village to the west, while east
lies the path away from the village.  {x
33438.name: Gravel Pathway (South of the Inn)

description: {WThe gravel path reaches the western edge of the village here.  To
the west, a large house rises up into the landscape.  The gravel path
now bends round to the south, towards the frozen stream that lies at
the centre of the village, accross the snowy plain.  {x
33446.name: Gravel Pathway

description: The main hallway is a grand room.  There are doors to the east and
west, leading off to the various rooms of the house.  Each door is
made from fine ash wood, and has a gold handle carved into the image
of a dragon's head.  The staircase itself is the grand center-piece of
the hallway.  It is enormously wide, with a fine red carpet running
down the steps.  The banister is made from expensive mahogany wood,
and has intricate carvings of figures down the sides, such as snakes,
dragons, and other magestic creatures.  The stairs spiral up to the
first floor.
33479.name: Main Hallway

description: {WThe gravel path comes to a halt here, as it reaches nowhere to
turn.  Hills and snowdrifts block the way back out onto the plains,
while the riverbank lies to the south.  The only way for now is back
into the village to the east.  {x
33475.name: End of the Path

description: You are inside a small log cabin, that has been converted into a
shop.  Crates of all different sorts of fish line the walls, and many
are hanging from hooks attatched to the ceiling.  The smell of fish
could kill a titan if it were in the least bit toxic.  There is a cart
out the back used for carrying the fish along the long, long trek to
neverwinter for trade.
33466.name: The {cF{Cis{Whmon{Cge{cr's{x

description: Shadows creep in and everything seems to get much darker here.  The
forest is thickening, and the crunches of feet on dead leaves and snow
seem to ring out like a warning call..  Or a battle call...
33416.name: {DInside {Ct{ch{Ce {DBarren {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33476.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33460.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WGravel stones have been used to create a road through the snow.
They form a path to the north, leaving white plains of snow on either
side.  Just over to the west, you can see a frozen over stream.  {x
33434.name: {DSoutheast {cE{Cd{Wg{Ce {DOf {cB{Cry{Wn Shan{Cde{cr{x

description: Sheer rockface jets out to the east, blocking any further
expedition in that direction.  To the north, a small hill holds the
black darkness of a cave entrance.  Sun bleached, frozen bones litter
the ground, and a sickly sweet smell wafts out from the hole.
33420.name: {DCave{c E{Cn{Wtran{Cc{ce{x

description: {WThe gravel pathway continues to follow the northern edge of the
village.  Up ahead, the smell of fish wafts all around.  There is a
larger building not far north that is of notice.  To the south, a
large plain of snow leads to the river, where children skate on the
frozen surface.  {x
33436.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WAs you get closer to the center of the village, the smell of fish
begins to dominate your olfactory senses.  The only thing keeping it
from completely overwhelming you is the bitterly cold temperature,
preserving and freezing the fish.  {x
33437.name: Gravel Pathway

description: Inside the boathouse is nothing but dust, broken wooden planks and
dust.  It has long since been abandoned.  There is a strong breeze
coming from the east, where the boathouse once opened onto the river.
33477.name: The {cB{Coa{Wtho{Cus{ce{x

description: {WThe plains span all around you, but a bitter cold blizzard is
stopping anything going into the centre of the plain, to the east.
There is a route through the snow storm to the west.  There are some
more signs of a village to the west here.
33409.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe blizzard is getting very strong here.  Snow is all around, it's
freezing chill biting at everything foolhardy enough to travel through
it.  There seems to be no more way forward to the east, perhaps try
another way.  {x
33432.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: Looking at the ground, a jagged and large rock looks out of place.
There is a small gap in between these stalagmites growing from the
floor that is covered with a large rock.
The cave forms a wide arc here, with stalagmites and stalagtites
randomly jutting from the ground or hanging ominously from the
cavernous ceiling, which looms approximately fourty feet from the
stone floor.  Blood is spattered over the ground and the walls, and
half eaten animal corpses slowly rot away to nothing.  The smell is
almost overpowering, and it stings the eyes and nose.  A form can be
made out in the darkness, hunched and still...
33425.name: {DLair {wof the {CI{cc{Ce {WY{we{Wt{wi{x

description: Trees loom around this area, seemingly holding everything in their
claustrophobic grip.  This is where the various animals of the tundra
roam.  Some harmless, some quite deadly, they all share one advantage:
You are on their turf.  This is their home...
33415.name: {DInside {Ct{ch{Ce {DBarren {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33406.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer{x

description: Trees loom around this area, seemingly holding everything in their
claustrophobic grip.  This is where the various animals of the tundra
roam.  Some harmless, some quite deadly, they all share one advantage:
You are on their turf.  This is their home...
33414.name: {DInside {Ct{ch{Ce {DBarren {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: Shadows creep in and everything seems to get much darker here.  The
forest is thickening, and the crunches of feet on dead leaves and snow
seem to ring out like a warning call..  Or a battle call...
33417.name: {DDeeper {ci{Cn {Wt{Ch{ce {DBarren {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: A strange smell...  One of rotting flesh mixed with age old dust
and grime, is omnipresent here.  Echos that sound like low, guttural
growls bounce off of the cave walls, reverberating and then receeding
back into the depths from whence they came.  Bones and other carrion
are beginning to become more numerous, it seems.  Something is visible
to the far left of the cave wall here...
33421.name: {DInside {cT{Ch{We Ca{Cv{ce{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33493.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: {WThe path through the mountains comes to an end.  There is, however,
a chasm below, like a gorge carved through a glacier.  It may be
possible to squeeze through the small opening below.  {x
33468.name: {DPath {ct{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {Dthe {cM{Cou{Wnta{Cin{cs{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33444.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer{x

description: {WFinally, there is a break from the relentless pounding of the
blizzard.  A man made pathway leads up a small mountainside onto a
plateau where a little village lies.  {x
33463.name: {cA{Cpp{Wroach{Cin{cg {DBryn {cS{Ch{Wand{Ce{cr{x

description: Below the Lair of the Ice Yeti, a small chasm has formed, leading
down into another much larger cave.  It is so steep and jagged that
climbing is impossible.  The only way down is to fly.  There is a
large roaring of an enormous creature below in the cave.
33426.name: A Small Chasm

description: {WThere appears to be a small trail through the plains, a path to the
north.  Perhaps it is the beginnings of a small settlement, or the
home of some large monsters, it is not possible to tell.  The Sea of
Moving Ice is ever closer to the west, and there are signs that some
life lives over there, on the icebergs.  {x
33428.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33458.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {W You stand in the vast tundra of Icewind Dale, a huge snow covered
plain, far north of the civilisations of waterdeep and the south.
Putridly cold winds seem slightly broken, but always as harsh.  There
appears to be nothing much around but an endless plain of ice and
snow.  A constant blizzard prevents a clear view of anthing around.  {x
33403.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: The growls that echo in the cave seem to be getting louder.
Whatever calls this wretched hole its home is not too far away.  The
horrible smell gains in intensity, wafts of it coming more often now.
Somewhere in the far distance, the sound of water slowly dripping can
be heard.
33422.name: {DInside {cT{Ch{We Ca{Cv{ce{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33492.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: {WLooming up ahead, a very large mountain blocks the horizon with its
snow covered peak.  The gorge runs deeper to the north, while the
sounds of a small village somewhere near to the southwest break the
chilling silence.  {x
33470.name: {DPath {cT{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {DThe {CI{cc{Cy {cG{Co{Wr{Cg{ce{x

description: {WThe sounds of life remain distant, and it seems that the animals
that reside here may have caught on to the fact that entering this
trail is suicidal.  A small opening in the wood is here, where it
would seem the braver of hunters decided to take matters into their
own hands, as opposed to waiting for a kill...  {x
33412.name: {cG{Cam{We Tr{Cai{cl{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33478.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: There is a large roaring fireplace situated on the north wall with
a chimney leading up out of the roof.  A large window looks out onto
the village to the south.  It is possible to see all the way down to
the frozen river, where some movement indicates the fishermen working
through holes in the ice.  A great rug on the floor depicts a graceful
ice dragon, which is rumoured to live off a trail somewhere in Icewind
Dale.
33481.name: Living Room

description: {WA few lifeless trees blow in the bitter cold wind.  They look
almost like stone, due to the petrifying nature of the cold weather
here.  They seem to block the path to the east, and the only way on
appears to be to the north, or back south to the edge of the plain.  {x
33408.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33456.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WMountains rise up and surround the path.  It is just possible to
squeeze through to the north, or turn back to the west and attempt to
leave through the blizzards in the plains, or to rest for a time at
the local village.  {x
33465.name: {DPath {ct{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {Dthe {cM{Cou{Wnta{Cin{cs{x

description: {WA few scattered trees have begun to surface on the plains to the
south.  The air bites relentlessly with its cold teeth and icy breath.
There are small billows of smoke rising from a village to the west,
complementing the icy-gray snow caps to the north.  {x
33402.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33491.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: {WYou tumble end over end as you rocket back down the mountain at a
breakneck pace.  You try to put your hands out to slow your decent,
and you recieve a few broken fingers and a sprained wrist for your
troubles.  You finally reach the bottom of the hill, where you crash
in a defeated heap.  Looks like you'll be nursing a few wounds before
attempting this climb again...  {x
33413.name: {cY{Cou{W've Slip{Cpe{cd{C!{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33496.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: {WThe path begins to get a bit precarious here.  There are various
rocky outcroppings lining the weatherbeaten road.  Wind and falling
snow have formed a thin, slick layer of ice over the steep climb, a
fact that many an unfortunate hunter has overlooked, only to feel the
cold, arctic wind blowing against their face as the tundra floor
rushes up to greet them, one final time.  {x
33410.name: {cG{Cam{We Tr{Cai{cl{x

description: {WThere seems to be a path to the west that has been trodden by
several human sized creatures.  Perhaps this could be one of the
villages found on the plains of icewind dale.  The rest of the plains
carry on to the east, while a traveller who needs to restock their
supplies can leave the plains, far to the southeast.  {x
33429.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WA large drift of snow is piled up, causing the path to vere off to
the north again to go past it.  The snow drift is piled up high
against some small shack.  {x
33441.name: Gravel Pathway

description: Many different trinkets are for sale in this shop.  Pomab, the
owner of the store, goes travelling frequently, picking up odds and
ends, and sells them for a tidy profit.  There are stacks and stacks
of clutter in the shop.
33497.name: Pomab's {cE{Cmp{Wor{Ciu{cm{x

description: {WSnow and ice fly around in the bitter cold wind.  Vision is highly
limited.  The only choice is to trek on into the blizzard, into the
freezing cold winds, or turn back and leave.  {x
33431.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: You are inside a small hut.  There are tables placed around the
wooden floor for people to sit at.  Over to the west wall, a large bar
dominates the room.  There is much to choose from, which is surprising
for such a small settlement.  Perhaps it is because there is nothing
else to do besides fish and drink in this village.
33467.name: {BThe {cW{Ci{Wnte{Cr'{cs {BCradle{x

description: This inn seems dark and dreary.  There are no separate rooms that
someone can rent, but instead, a large set of beds to rest in
separated with some sort of curtains fashioned from animal hide.
Pictures on the walls depict large and mythical monsters, treasures
and beautiful women, fuelling the lust of the adventurer to go out and
seek their glory.  This inn was obviously built to be a resting place
for travellers on their way to some adventures.
33498.name: {BThe {cS{Cno{Wwdr{Cif{ct {Binn{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33452.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: The forest is almost unbelievably dark here.  An overwhelming sense
of immediate danger permiates the area.  There are no sounds present,
save the occasional *thump* of a pack of snow falling from the trees
and hitting the frozen ground.  It seems as if whatever makes its lair
here has scared away any would-be competition completely.
33419.name: {CT{ch{Ce {DDeepest {cR{Ce{Wach{Ce{cs {Dof the {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33453.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe icy tundra of Icewind Dale reaches the edge of the coastline
here.  To the west, the glaciers of the Sea of Moving Ice reach all
the way to the north of the world.  The plains extend further north.  {x
33405.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: The kitchen is filled with many appliances and utensils.  There is
a large work bench for preparing food and next to it, a huge iron
stove.  Cutlery and other cooking utensils are stored in racks and
cupboards on the walls, and there is a large serving hatch on the
north wall.
33487.name: Kitchen

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33457.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33404.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer{x

description: The forest is almost unbelievably dark here.  An overwhelming sense
of immediate danger permiates the area.  There are no sounds present,
save the occasional *thump* of a pack of snow falling from the trees
and hitting the frozen ground.  It seems as if whatever makes its lair
here has scared away any would-be competition completely.
33418.name: {DDeeper {ci{Cn {Wt{Ch{ce {DBarren {cW{Co{Wo{cd{x

description: A small stove is here, with a flume leading out to the ceiling.  It
is used to heat water for the spacious cast iron bath tub in the
centre.  A lavatory is neatly tucked away in the corner of the room.
A low shelf below the south facing window stores many perfums and oils
for a luxurious bath.
33484.name: Bathroom

description: {WThe riverbanks are south and east of the gravel path, forcing it to
alter course and head off to the west.  The pathway is getting very
narrow here too, as it reaches the edge of the village.  {x
33474.name: Gravel Pathway

description: Atop the stairs is a large open room.  As with the downstairs hall,
there is a beautiful ornate door to the west, and another to the east.
The one to the west has a large lock on it, and obviously belongs to
the owner of the house.  The other door has a sign above it saying
"servant's quarters."  The grand staircase leads down to the ground
floor.
33482.name: First Floor Landing

description: {WAnother curve in the gravel path is caused by a large mound of
snow.  The path now bends round to the west again, leading towards the
large house, and south to another big building.  {x
33447.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33455.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe large mountain is now closer to the north.  The walls of the
gorge are so smooth that climbing up would be impossible.  Back to the
south, the gorge slopes upwards to it's eventual exit back to the icy
plains.  {x
33471.name: {DPath {cT{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {DThe {CI{cc{Cy {cG{Co{Wr{Cg{ce{x

description: {cThe river here is nothing but a small stream, that has been frozen
over completely solid.  There are a few fishing holes drilled in the
river that the fishermen use to catch some of the local stock of fish,
but most go to the sea of moving ice.  {x
33495.name: {WA {CF{crozen {CR{civer

description: You are in a large bedroom decorated with gems and gold, trinkets
of beauty and paintings of vast and beautful scenes.  A four poster
bed towers up to the ceiling, with wonderful silk drapes hanging
around.  A dilver framed window lets in the sunlight directly making
the room feel warmer in the icy cold surroundings of icewind dale.
There is a small open doorway to the south leading into a bathroom.
33483.name: Master Bedroom

description: {WThe path slopes down into a gorge, like a wedge cut out of the ice
and snow.  The sides are unscalable, and the only way to proceed is to
the north.  The narrow gorge shelters all who pass through it from the
bitter wind across all of icewind dale.  {x
33469.name: {DPath {cT{Ch{Wrou{Cg{ch {DThe {CI{cc{Cy {cG{Co{Wr{Cg{ce{x

description: {WThe smell of fish here is unbelieveably terrible.  The villagers
must have built up an immunity to it over the years.  There is a shop
to the south, that isnt too far from the frozen river.  Surrounding
the outside of the shop, several racks hold fish, drying and freezing
in the cold windy air.  {x
33443.name: Gravel Pathway (North of the Fishmonger's)

description: The dining room has a large circular table in the centre that can
seat about 8 people.  Candlesticks line the tables, both silver and
gold, and there is a cabinet on the west wall filled with fine
crockery.  There is another typically beautiful wooden door to the
south, and a serving hatch on the south wall, indicating the kitchen
is there.
33480.name: Dining Room

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33454.name: {cT{Che{W Pla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe trail levels out here, and proceeds to the north once again.
What was probably a green forest, a millenium ago, sprawls out
unevenly to the sides of the trail.  Broken, barren tree limbs hang
limply over the tiny road, weighed down by aeons of snow accumulation.
It is hard to believe that any sort of animal could survive in such
hostile environs, but nonetheless, the unmistakeable sound of life can
be heard issuing from the deep reaches of the stripped wood.  Maybe
that sound means venison for a hungry traveller...  {x
33411.name: {cG{Cam{We Tr{Cai{cl{x

description: A pipe runs from the Master Bathroom into here bringing hot water
into the bath.  The room is quite small, and the bath is next to a
small toilet.  The only exit is the door back to the north.
33486.name: Servant's Bathroom

description: {y| {WT{whis area, and all the {y|
{y| {wareas {WNW {wof {WWaterdeep{y  |
{y| {wto {cI{Cce{Wwind D{Cal{ce {whave   {y|
{y| {wbeen built by {RA{rmanar{w.  {y|
{WYou stand in the vast tundra of Icewind Dale.  There are mountains
protruding to the north.  An icy wind cuts into your face as it
bellows in from the Spine of the World.  As you look around, you can
see the sun shining down upon you.  A path leads off towards the
north, and the plains stretch out far to the west...  {x {WA small plaque
floats here.  {x
33400.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe mound of snow levells off, and the path resumes it's westerly
direction.  Over to the north, there are a few small insignificant
huts, probably where some village fishermen live.  {x
33442.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WThe icy wind picks up a bit here as you get closer to the Sea of
Moving Ice far to the west, over some rather high snow covered hills.
The gravel path continues from north to south.  {x
33449.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WSnow and ice fly around in the bitter cold wind.  Vision is highly
limited.  The only choice is to trek on into the blizzard, into the
freezing cold winds, or turn back and leave.  {x
33433.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33461.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WClose to the Sea of Moving Ice, is a small village.  Ironmaster
village holds no more than 20 or 30 people, who live there mainly to
fish, for the great salmon there which can make a tidy profit.  It
also has an iron mine of exceptional quality.  Snow sprays around in
the air, making vision very limited.  {x
33430.name: {DThe {cE{Ca{Wste{Cr{cn{D Edge of {cI{Cro{Wnmas{Cte{cr {DVillage{x

description: You are inside a rather nice house, especially considering the
location.  There are fine silk woven carpets lining the floor, and the
beams in the ceiling are of the finest ash wood.  The main hallway is
to the north of the house.
33489.name: Hrothgar's {cH{Co{Wu{Cs{ce{x

description: {WThe gravel pathway passes a large tavern to the north.  The path
curves round to the west now running almost parallel with the frozen
rivver to the south.  Loud singing, and other boisterous behaviour is
commonplace here.  {x
33440.name: Gravel Pathway (South of the Tavern)

description: {WThe wind hurls snow around you.  The blizzard is so severe that you
can't see anything more than a foot infront of you.  In fact, there is
nothing around anywhere, except bitterly cold winds, ice and snow.  {x
33462.name: {cT{Che {WPla{Cin{cs{x

description: {WThe gravel pathway curves again, this time northward.  There is a
large building up ahead with the loud sounds of a public house.  You
can also see the frozen river from here to the south, accross a vast
snow covered plain.  {x
33439.name: Gravel Pathway

description: {WPombab's Emporium
{x
{R       N
{x
{WThe gravel path continues from east to west along the northern edge
of the village.  There are some small houses to the south, and the
fishmongers is just east of here.  There is a small shack to the
north, with a sign outside.  {x
33445.name: Gravel Pathway (South of Pomab's Emporium)

description: A sharp curve twists through the cave, funelling the roaring sounds
through like an amplifier.  A terrible smell is coming from the south,
like rotting flesh.  The booming echo gives the mipression that
something unpleasant and hungry is going to make some restless
traveller it's meal.
33423.name: {cI{Cn {WT{Ch{ce {DBowels {cO{Cf {WT{Ch{ce {DCave{x

description:
This rabbit is blindingly white, a natural camouflage that allows
it to blend in with the surrounding snow in the frozen wasteland that
it calls home.
33499.room_name: A snow rabbit is here, seeking shelter of some sort.
33499.name: A snow rabbit~
subroutines:
F for V
F par AH

description:
Blindingly white fur dominates the tundra wolf's features, as with
most animals of the Dale.  Its ice-blue eyes bore into you, and its
mouth recoils in a ferocious snarl.
33498.room_name: A tundra wolf senses your presence and lets out a snarl.
33498.name: A tundra wolf~

33450.room_name: {wAn enormous, gargantuan {Rd{rr{Ya{yg{ro{Yn {wsits here{W,{w with his body as solid as {Ci{cc{Ce{W,{w he watches your every move.{x
33450.name: the {Wgiant {wdragon of {CF{cr{Cos{ct{x~
subroutines:
M random 33418 30~
M exall 33416 3~
M death 33450 100~
M fight 33415 2~

description:
Pomab is a stout little dwarf with a long red beard.  He is wearing
all sorts of strange bright garments put together in an eclectic
ensemble.
33451.room_name: Pomab the Dwarf stands behind the counter greeting all into his strange little shop.
33451.name: Pomab the Dwarf~

33452.room_name: An old, tired man is lying on the ground, dying in pain.
33452.name: {wA withered, old {Btr{Cea{bsu{cre {Dhu{c{bn{Cte{Br{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 33455 100~
M death 33456 90~

description:
This man is wearing a bloody apron covered in stains of fish guts,
and man, does he stink of fish.
33453.room_name: The Fishmonger is here selling fish of all sorts.
33453.name: the fishmonger~

description:
This short little creature stands on a platform behind the bar so
that you can see him.
33454.room_name: A Halfling Barman stands ready to take your order.
33454.name: the halfling barman~

description:
Laeria is a beautiful elven girl, wearing fine robes and possesses
the symbols of Lathander.
33455.room_name: {WL{waeria{x the {CE{cl{gv{ce{Cn {WH{wealer{x is here healing weary travellers.
33455.name: {WL{waeria{x the {CE{cl{gv{ce{Cn {WH{wealer{x~

description:
This is a young human boy, around 13 years of age.  He is dressed
in thick furs to keep him warm and he smells of fish.  The lucky boy. 
:P
33456.room_name: A Small boy is here, fishing through a hole in the ice.
33456.name: a fishing boy~

description:
A finely dressed man stands before you.  He is wearing a finely cut
suit, and not the usual furs of the rest of the villagers.  His house
is warm and he doesnt need them.
33457.room_name: Hrothgar, the owner of the house is here.
33457.name: Hrothgar~
33457.t_flags: T What are you doing in my house?~

33458.room_name: A Servant wanders the house doing duties for his master.
33458.name: Hrothgar's Servant~

description:
Not many venture out through the cold of icewind dale.  This
villager has their face wrapped heavily with a scarf, and are wearing
thick furs to keep out the cold.
33459.room_name: {xAn {cI{Cce{Wwind D{Cal{ce{x Villager wanders out in the cold village.
33459.name: A villager~

33460.room_name: An Old Man rests at the table, half asleep from a little too much alcohol.
33460.name: a drunk old man~

description:
Matted, filthy fur is clumped around this creature's body.  It
stands on two legs, patches of hairlessness showing that it has
survived quite a few battles in its lifetime.  It's massive weight
sends loose rock tumbling from the ceiling as it stomps the ground. 
It glowers down at you, and bears its canines, undeniably ready for
the fight that is sure to ensue...
33497.room_name: A gigantic, slobbering Ice Yeti leaps from the shadows!
33497.name: A gigantic, slobbering Ice Yeti~

33400.room_name: (Wizi) A imp task mob performs mprogs.
33400.name: the Task Mob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 33400 15~
M grall 33401 100~

33401.name: freezing wind mob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 33402 50~

33402.room_name: The maze plains wind mob casting mprogs is here
33402.name: maze plains wind mob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 33407 90~

description:
This savage and large wolf has a chillingly ocld wintery white
pelt, and is very very angry.
33403.room_name: An ice cold {Wwhite wolf{x snarls towards you.
33403.name: a {WWi{Cn{wt{Ce{Wr Wolf{x~
subroutines:
M exall 33408 1~
M exall 33408 3~
M exall 33408 0~
M exall 33408 2~
M exall 33408 4~

description:
This is a large white bear with a thick fur skin.  It is pretty
nasty and rather tough.
33404.room_name: A great big {WP{wolar {WB{wear{x stands on his hind legs and roars.
33404.name: a {WP{wolar {WB{wear{x~

description:
He is here to keep this room able to recall out, yet block teleporters
from gaining access to the loot. Let the imms know if he's visible. 
Thanks!
33405.room_name: ({WWizi{x) teleport blocker mprog mob is here, and shouldn't be visible to you!
33405.name: IWD teleport blocker mob~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 33409 fades into existence.~
